author: Leigh Ann Caldwell
title: Conservative group to launch ads opposing mail-in voting
description: Honest Elections Project is launching a week-long $250,000 digital and television ad campaign on Fox News, MSNBC and CNN to protect against the “brazen attempt to manipulate the election system for partisan advantage.”
content:
Conservative group to launch ads opposing mail-in voting
WASHINGTON A conservative group has launched a paid advertising campaign against mail-in voting amid the escalating, partisan battle over alternative ways to vote as the coronavirus pandemic rages.
